void NVTFile::writeLastFrame ( ofstream &  output  )  [virtual]

Write last frame (dummy data) to output file (so that we know how many frames were in the video, even if there is no spot in the last frame!)

Write last frame (dummy data) to output file (so that we know how many frames were in the video, even if there is no spot in the last frame!)
